channel.title: Staff only item
channel.description: hey, i made it so the item gets deleted if it is clicked on now, but only while in your open inventory. so if your banking, you CAN bank it, and trade it Sad the trading part is what I'm most worried about. any suggestions? also, does anyone have a list of the player animations?

item.title: Staff only item
item.dc:creator: @Helbound Helbound
item.description:
@Helbound wrote:

Heres the emote list: http://s1.uppit.com/d/A8Q3QW

Here’s the TUT:

[hr]

Step 1:

Search for:

public int untradable[] = {};

And add between the two breakers ( {} ) the item id’s of the items you don’t want to be tradable.

When your done, it should look something like this:

public int untradable[] = {ITEMIDHERE};

And if you want to make more than one item untradable, place a comma in between each item id and space, like this:

public int untradable[] = {0000, 0000};

If you need any more help, PM me.

Read full topic
